title: Ideas for you
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Joe Scully
brief_description: Productivity ideas are vital to progress in Australian industry. Productivity groups of twelve or more meet regularly to exchange ideas. A new method of coating earth moving equipment, new fixing cement, a shortened cycle in washing machines, an insulated container for freighting dry ice, and a new method of packing poultry, are some results of the group’s activities.
